bibl.title: The Earliest Known Invocation of the Mother of God. Reflections on Rylands Papyrus 470.
bibl.publisher: The Ecumenical Society of the Blessed Virgin Mary
bibl.note: P. Ryl. III, 470 (= van Haelst 983). - 1. Text and translation. - 2. The origin and date of this prayer. - 3. Remarks on the wording. - 4. The orthodoxy of the doctrine implied in this prayer.
bibl.seg: McHugh John, The Earliest Known Invocation of the Mother of God. Reflections on Rylands Papyrus 470.
